"Waspinator is blasting enemy" Waspinator said over the com link to 
megatron even though he was within voice range.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Megatron--
> 
> Megatron ignores Nemesis Enforcer's comments, and heads towards 
side 
> exit that Waspinator had used. He opens a comm along the 
> way, "Waspinator, status report. Nemesis Enforcer, as soon as you 
> and Perceptor exit the base, it'll be locked down by my voice 
> command. I will not allow a simplton Maximal to dent my future." He 
> keeps running.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "lordunitronx" <KSLawDogg@c...> wrote:
> > (If I haven't responded to my sister for three weeks, why the 
hell 
> > would I respond to you? :)
> > 
> > Nemesis Enforcer:
> > 
> > 
> > He received Megatron's orders.  "Oh, fine," he replied over the 
> comm. 
> > to Megatron, "it's not like I'm not slaggin' busy!" he yelled, 
> > throwing everything he was carrying down.  He drew his trusty 
> laser 
> > rifle from subspace.  The Predacon gave it a quick look over to 
> make 
> > sure it wasn't damaged in the crash.  It wasn't.
> > 
> > Nemesis Enforcer headed for the nearest way out of this Maximal 
> > deathtrap of a ship.
